review: My wife  went to get a Pap smear done .The doctor was very supportive and helped us emotionally as well . She was able to understand our concerns and give cost effective treatments.

tags: None
review: The doctor did my gyne examination and the tool she used was very dirty and covered in yellow stuff. She didn't even give me the privacy to change my garments. The cloth on bed was old and dusty. She was also handling the gyne exam roughly and gossiping with her staff about my condition in front of me. During the blood test also I had to use my hand to tighten it from the arm as they didn't have the strap. Even the cotton used after drawing out blood looked really dirty. The staff was also very unhelpful and only gave me the bills after asking several times. I trusted practo with the reviews but the place is quite the opposite. ****** **** ***** *** ****** ******* ** **** ******
